name: Alchibi_Des
content:
Alchibi Des, known to his aquaintences as Alchi, was a male Chevin salesman on a colony world.
Alchibi Des was a Chevin merchant on an unknown colony world during the reign of the Galactic Empire. He was arrested for the murder of Seth Horgon, the son of prominant nerf rancher. While awaiting trial, Des was detained in the office of Marshal Jacobi Sterne. There he was visited by Malisan, a young Twi'lek male who served as an indentured servant working as a nerf herder on the Horgon ranch. Alchibi had befriended the boy and encouraged him to pursue his skills as a dancer.
After a secret meeting where Alchibi, offered to Seth Horgon and Malisan, Horgon refused to sell Malisan's contract.
Solk Horgon and his gang attacked the office of the Marshal, with the intent of hanging Alchibi regardless of guilt. The Marshal, Alchibi, and Malisan escaped the fire fight by way of a secret tunnel.
Alchibi Des appeared in the role-playing sourcebook Far Horizons released in 2014 and developed by Sam Stewart.
